product_name: NYX Professional MakeupSuede Matte Lipstick Lightweight Vegan Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackObsessed with Suede Matte Lip Liner? You'll love NYX Professional Makeup Suede Matte Lipstick, a non-drying matte lipstick offering hours of smooth coverage.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-drying velvety-matte lipstickSuper soft & lightweight lipstick with full coverage bold pigment and no tug applicationAvailable in many lip shades from the perfect nude lip to an iconic red lip and gothic black lipstickShades match perfectly with their bestie Suede Matte Lip Pencils; This dynamic duo are great together or on their own, both offering hours of smooth matte coverage that never feels dryFeaturing an adorable heart-adorned caseVegan lipstick formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2530262How To UseWear the lipstick by itself or line and layer over the matching Suede Matte Lip Liner and double the color for an intense, fuller-looking pout.IngredientsIsononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Polyisobutene, Silica, Nylon-12, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla, Polyethylene, Paraffin, Kaolin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Glycerin, Alumina, Aluminum Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Barium Sulfate (CI 77120), Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Eugenol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate. May Contain: Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Wear the lipstick by itself or line and layer over the matching Suede Matte Lip Liner and double the color for an intense, fuller-looking pout.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: Love the application of this lovely fall color. Good lasting power.

reviews.headline: I need more colors
reviews.comments: I have been told red lipstick looks good on me. Was excited to try however when I opened the package, there were flaws in the product. They were little blooms or spots. Upon further research I came to the conclusion that it was the ingredients blooming. I do live in a hot humid environment which explains it. I have been wearing it and no problems have occurred. It feel light weight and moisturizing at the same time.

reviews.headline: Love this lipstick
reviews.comments: Love this color which compliments my skin tone and is a matte finish.

reviews.headline: I do buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: This is the ONLY matte lipstick I will wear! It absolutely doesn't bleed and if I put another shimmer lipstick on over it for shine, it doesn't bleed either!

reviews.headline: LOVEEEE COLOR BUUUUT
reviews.comments: Love color. Faded fast.

reviews.headline: LOVEEEE COLOR BUUUUT
reviews.comments: Love color. Faded fast.

reviews.headline: LOVEEEE COLOR BUUUUT
reviews.comments: Love color. Faded fast.

reviews.headline: A beautiful, long lasting lipstick!
reviews.comments: I bought this for a concert I'm performing, and let me tell you, this is the perfect cherry red lipstick for the show! It is a way more affordable alternative for Anastasia Beverly Hill's American Doll Satin Lipstick, and it is a perfect match of Taylor Swift's iconic red lip! It has incredible color payoff and feels like nothing on my lips!

reviews.headline: Love this lipstick!
reviews.comments: I have been using this lipstick for probably the last 7 to 8 years, my fav shade is Clinger. It's a bright fuchsia color and I get so many compliments. The lipstick itself last all day long. The only downside is that it does transfer easily when you first apply, so blotting is a must! I prefer this lipstick over the more expensive brand.

reviews.headline: It works
reviews.comments: I needed the black one for a constume, and it works well enough. It has sort of a strong vanilla smell I don't love, but the product is affordable and works alright.

reviews.headline: Comes in damaged
reviews.comments: Product damaged upon arrival

reviews.headline: I brought this for my daughter and she loves it
reviews.comments: She mixes with other colors to get a dramatic effect.

reviews.headline: Color is gorgeous but it does not pamper
reviews.comments: Like so many NYX products, I love the bright colors, and I always get so many compliments when I wear them. It does not look cheap, but I will say the price point really hits regarding moisture, or lack thereof, on mature skin. These lipsticks require a liner in order to prevent bleeding into fine lines, and can be drying with long wear. Not in any way a bad product, but not a $50 lipstick either. Fun for the price.

reviews.headline: a few notes???
reviews.comments: This lipstick is ful-coverage, however it is a little grainy-- with a flour-like texture I find unpleasing. it is DEFINITELY NOT SMUDGE-PROOF. in fact, it wipes off any chance it can get. if you want to swatch it, on your wrists or anywhere else BUT the lips, be aware IT WILL STAIN. my fellow goths, if you want a transfer-proof lipstick, this would not be the first choice, from my experience. great coverage, but it's a sensory nightmare! best paired with lipgloss.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love this. Stays long time. The color is my favorite.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love this. Stays long time. The color is my favorite.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Absolutely beautiful! I'll be buying this again.

reviews.headline: Color Was Way Off
reviews.comments: I purchased "Free Spirit" which appears online to be a true brown shade and beautiful. The description says "medium nude with pink" which would be perfect for me.  However, when I received it and applied it to my lips, it is ORANGE!  I looked like a clown wearing this.  I will definitely be returning this as soon as I can.  I am fair complected with brown hair.

reviews.headline: Rubs off
reviews.comments: I bought the shade "Alien" for a last minute costume, but it is probably the worst lipstick I've used. The color wears off shortly after applying, you can't talk or eat/drink while wearing it. The base is red, and leaves light staining after using makeup remover. If you're looking for black lipstick, try a different brand.

reviews.headline: Cute
reviews.comments: Love the color!! First time trying this brand and I was pleased.

faceoff_positive.comments: I received the shade 'Brunch Me' and although I like it very much, I was initially pretty nervous about wearing it due to its terracotta color and my pale skin. It warmed to me and it wears nicely throughout the day. It's not a true matte. It appears matte, but I would say it's more of a satin. It transfers, even after hours of wear. The bullet gives a nice amount of product and the componenet is cute. Smells decadent, but not overpowering. Has no real taste if you get it in your mouth. Depending on activities, it may need reapplied every few hours. It doesn't bunch up or dry out the lips.
faceoff_positive.headline: Creamy

faceoff_negative.comments: Good overall matte lipstick but packaging is horrible.  when you take the tape off of a new tube their is a stickiness texture all over and you basically need goo be gone or your favorite remover to clean the tube up or your fingers stay sticky and it ruins the whole experience.  I believe the best part of makeup is seeing it brand new for the first time untouched like opening up a brand new mascara and hearing that little 'pop'...Plus the made in China lingo should be printed someplace on the tube more inconspicuous...
faceoff_negative.headline: NYX Makeup Crew Box Review - Aug 2018
